name: flush-requires-boilerplate-webpack
description: A boilerplate showing how to achieve Universal Code-Splitting and Universal HMR with react-universal-component, webpack-flush-chunks and extract-css-chunks-webpack-plugin
author: James Gillmore <james@faceyspacey.com>

scripts.start: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development babel-watch server/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel-watch server/index.js
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: rimraf build/client/* && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/client.prod.js
scripts.build:server: rimraf build/server/* && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/server.prod.js
